snippet.title: Saint Seiya : Legend of Justice - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The First Saint Seiya Idle RPG is coming soon!🔥🔥🔥
🎁Pre-Order and get an abundance of prizes!
📲Pre-order on Stores (AM): https://bit.ly/3QlEPXy
📲Pre-order on Stores (EU): https://bit.ly/3mOt7qR
🔖Reminder: For Google Users, please remember to choose the [Automatic Install] option, and once our game is released, you can quickly join us and grab the Gold Knights Reward Box!
📲Pre-registration Page with more rewards: https://saintseiya.wdyxgames.com/pre/

✨Follow our official Facebook to join pre-order event and grab a chance to get prizes, such as Amazon gift cards or Gold Knights figure, etc. 
EN▸https://www.facebook.com/seiyaLoJ
ES▸https://www.facebook.com/SeiyaES
PT▸https://www.facebook.com/SeiyaPT
FR▸https://www.facebook.com/SeiyaFR

❣The First Saint Seiya Idle RPG"Saint Seiya: Legend of Justice"pre-login is in full swing!🔥🔥🔥 At present, the official pre-registration number has exceeded 1 million, and the new game promotional video has been released!🎉🎉🎉

⚔100% restore the role of the big move; one-handed operation to enjoy the fun of Saint Seiya battle at any time; pre-battle formation, strategy to win, PVP battle to the weak to win the strong.

🔥Saint Seiya Justice Legend, make an appointment now to get🎁 4-star Phoenix Ikki. Log in beforehand to reach 2 million to unlock the Golden Saint Seiya reward.

😃Come on now!!!
